title: Ep 52: Emily Weiss of Glossier
itunes:title: Ep 52: Emily Weiss of Glossier

description:
Emily Weiss, founder and CEO of Glossier, talks about the moment she knew she had a killer idea, the future of the brand, and gives us a sneak peek to some upcoming products. Before the interview: We chat about lady mustaches, hanging with Bella Hadid, and beauty apps worth downloading.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
